users.name: Muhammad Taha
users.details: Look and think before opening the shutter. The heart and mind are the true lens of the camera.

users.name: Ahmed Beheiry
users.details: Life is like a camera. Just focus on what’s important and capture the good times, develop from the negatives and if things don’t work out, just take another shot.

users.name: Mohamed Elbermawy
users.details: In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality.

users.name: Aly Ebrahim
users.details: Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever… It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.

users.name: Abdallah Ahmed
users.details: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

users.name: Mohamed Shaban
users.details: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

users.name: Mohamed Magdy
users.details: A thing that you see in my pictures is that I was not afraid to fall in love with these people.
